definition: to extract (ore, minerals etc)/to refine/to purify/to process
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]

sentences.english: The extracted oriental and occidental essence is embodied by a combination of undecorated quality and fashionable elements.
sentences.chinese: 提炼中西精华，不经装饰的特质与时尚元素相结合。

sentences.english: This volume distills 20 years of trading and teaching experience.
sentences.chinese: 这本书提炼了20年的交易和教学经验。

sentences.english: Is he trying to put messy lives into perfect prose?
sentences.chinese: 他是否正在尝试将混乱的人生提炼成完美的韵文？

sentences.english: The butter is the fat which in the milk refines, the color and the taste similar edible butter.
sentences.chinese: 酥油是牛奶中提炼出来的脂肪，色与味类似食用黄油。
把调查结论提炼成向面试官提的问题。

sentences.english: Ineos has a large traditional refinery business.
sentences.chinese: 英力士在传统是由提炼业务中占有很大比例。

sentences.english: Tallow alcohol can be further refined into cetyl and stearyl alcohols.
sentences.chinese: 牛脂醇可以进一步提炼成十六烷和十八烷醇。

sentences.english: My hometown Maoming is a city designed for refining oil.
sentences.chinese: 我家乡茂名是为了提炼石油而设计的。

sentences.english: How can you extract this information and sell it?
sentences.chinese: 你如何能够提炼这种信息并出售它？

sentences.english: When that shall vade, my verse distills your truth.
sentences.chinese: 我笔下的诗歌却会提炼出你的真。

sentences.english: Algae-based fuel can be added directly into existing refining and distribution systems;
sentences.chinese: 藻类燃料可以直接添加进当前的提炼和分销系统。

sentences.english: Gulistan endeavors to seek a state and apply more precise words.
sentences.chinese: 她在寻找一种状态，在提炼一种更加精确的语言。

sentences.english: At the same time he uses Beijing native language refined , give to personages with the life.
sentences.chinese: 同时他运用经过提炼的北京话，赋予人物以生命。

sentences.english: This medicine was extracted from the gallbladder of snakes.
sentences.chinese: 药剂是用蛇胆提炼而成的。

sentences.english: We are all put on the potters wheel and He refines us like gold.
sentences.chinese: 我们都在他这窑匠的手中，他将我们提炼成金。

sentences.english: Scrap metal can Be recycled (turned) into "gold and silver".
sentences.chinese: 废物利用，废铜烂铁可提炼出“金子”“银子”。

definition: to refine (a substance)/to purify/to refine (one's skills, writing etc)/refined/polished/succinct/skilled/capable
to withdraw (money)/to collect (left luggage)/to extract/to refine
to concentrate (a liquid)/concentration/espresso coffee/abbr. for 意式濃縮咖啡|意式浓缩咖啡
to sum up/to summarize/to conclude from facts/induction (method of deduction in logic)
lit. to get rid of the weeds and keep the flowers/to separate the wheat from the chaff (idiom)
(textiles) to scour/to degum (silk)/variant of 精煉|精炼[jing1 lian4]
